Description: Handle sliver of Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Circular stamp with Helios head symbol. Clay near fine buff; red-brown core; cream slip.
Curator's comments: Name Polyaratos. Probably drawn by Petrie (Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p.175, 6). From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0197.07.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1133)
